title: Rajadhyaksha: difficult to see 2.5 percent inflation in 2017
itunes:title: Rajadhyaksha: difficult to see 2.5 percent inflation in 2017
description:
Barclays Capital's Ajay Rajadhyaksha discusses a structural change in inflation on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Barry Ritholtz.
